mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (menu_name, menu_type, parent_id, iconcls_, request_, expand_, sort_no, leaf_, state_, remark_, enable_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by ) values (#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iconcls_ = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_ = #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expand_ = #{expand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort_no = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leaf_ = #{leaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state_ = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, menu_name, menu_type, parent_id, iconcls_, request_, expand_, sort_no, leaf_, state_, remark_, enable_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from sys_menu where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
